EmailTemplate.description: Notifies CS partner that a CS application has been denied credit
EmailTemplate.name: CS Partner - Credit Denied
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name}'s Community Solar Application Has Been Denied
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Partner_Name__c},
{!Lead.Name} has unfortunately not met BlueWave's required credit criteria and is therefore unable to proceed any further in the community solar application process.
We have notified {!Lead.Name} of his/her application status.
Please contact BlueWave Partner Support if you have any questions about this community solar application.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.997.2432 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
